cx-javascript: Bin ŋɔ ku tooi tum tuma diyi niŋ ka JavaScript kani. JavaScript ŋɔ kpihimi, bee di zaɣisi la tuma tumbu bee browser ŋɔ m be tumda.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Content Translation]] nyɛla binshɛli din lɛbigiri tunzuŋ yɛltɔɣa a ya balli ni yomyom. [$1 Lihi mili n-nya pumpɔŋɔ!]
cx-error-server-connection: Gbɛ ŋmɛ: koŋ baŋ tõɔ de gaa ko a tontona.
cx-desc: Veŋ ka a e mɔlɔ [[Special:ContentTranslation|translate]] gampɛle yelzu
cx-publish-page-success: gbambiɛlinli maa zaŋ wuhi salo la $1
cx-publish-error-readonly: Soli kani zaŋ ti wiki sabbu
cx-lost-session: A saha ŋɔ maa din na naaya
cx-lost-session-draft: A saha ŋɔ maa din na naaya. A tohibu ŋɔ maa pala binshɛli din ni tooi pahi yaha naɣila a lan labimi n-kpe
cx-lost-session-publish: A saha ŋɔ maa din na naaya. A tohibu ŋɔ maa pala binshɛli din ni tooi pahi yaha hali ka a ti lan labimi n-kpe
cx-lost-session-dashboard: A yi bɔri ni a tooi niŋ niŋsim ŋɔ, nyin dimi suɣulo ka labi kpe
cx-publish-summary: Di nambu maa yila "$1" lɛbigibu ni na
cx-entrypoint-dialog-page-doesnt-exist-y: Yaɣili ŋɔ na ka $1. Niŋmi {{GENDER:|a }} bɔrimi ni a nam lit?
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-notice: Nammi yaɣ' palli ka di nyɛla a yɛn lɛbigila zuliya shɛli a ni mi.
cx-special-login-error: Di tumi ni a kpe yaɣili ŋɔ puuni pɔi ka naanyi lɛbigi li. [$1 kpɛma]
cx-tools-instructions-text2: {{GENDER:|You}} di bi kpa ni a zaŋ di zaa pahi
cx-tools-instructions-text3: {{GENDER:|Make}} che ka kariŋ maa kum lu
cx-tools-instructions-text5: {{GENDER:|Publish}} zaŋmi a ni lɛnigi shɛli maa wuhi salo
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Bɔsaha {{GENDER:|ka a }} mali suhupiɛlli a ni nya shɛli maa, dihimi "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
cx-tools-mt-dont-use: Pilimi gbambi~lin' shɛli din na ka shɛli
cx-tools-mt-set-default: Che ka di kuli be yiŋa biɛhigu
cx-warning-unsaved-translation: A lahabali lɛbigibu shɛli bi kpe
cx-page-selector-widget-recent-edits-lab: Nyini n na yoli taɣi li
cx-source-page-selector-input-placeholde: Bɔmi yaɣili shee n-lɛbigi di zuliya yɛltɔɣa
cx-source-page-selector-no-search-result: Yaɣ' shɛŋa bi bɔ n-nya $1" in $2
cx-selected-source-page-view-count: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 visit per|$1 visits per|0=No visits this}} bakɔi
cx-selected-source-page-error-page-and-t: Yuli ŋɔ pun bela [$1 $2] zaŋ ti [$3 yaɣ' shɛli dabam]
cx-selected-source-page-error-title-in-u: Taachi zaŋ ti yaɣ' palli ŋɔ nyɛla  [$1 din pun beni tumdi tuma]
cx-favorite-added-for-later-detail: Di zaŋ zali gu guzuli! Yulimi buɣisiri shɛŋa ŋan doya saha sh~li kam ni bɔra.
cx-favorite-removed: Di yi a ni bɔri shɛŋa puuni!
cx-mt-abuse-error-title: A lɛbigibu maa {{PLURAL:$1|contains}} din kalinli paai $1% di bachinima maa bi taɣi.
cx-mt-abuse-error-sections: A lɛbigibu maa malila yaɣ' shɛŋa din kpa talahi ka di bachinima maa bi taɣi.
cx-mt-abuse-warning-title: A lɛbigibu maa yaɣ' shɛli  {{PLURAL:$1|malila}} $1% bachi shɛŋa din bi taɣi
cx-publish-captcha-title: Di yuunimi ni nya a pala robɔti.
cx-captcha-dialog-error: A labisigu maa bi nyani din tuhi. Pahimi suɣilo, labi mo yaha.
cx-dashboard-sidebar-information: lahabali din na beni ti kpatuɣili ŋɔ
cx-suggestionlist-empty-desc: Ti bɛ nya buɣisa. A ni tooi labi lihi nya di yi tooi biɛla bee ka a bo yaɣ' shɛŋa kpa talahi ka di nyɛla kpatuɣ' shɛli ti ni zaŋ wuhi a la. (di mali tuma)
cx-suggestionlist-view-source-page: Nyami di ni yi shɛli na
cx-save-draft-save-success: Kpɛya {{PLURAL:$1|minti yini din gari ŋɔ puuni|$1 mintinima din gari ŋɔ puuni|0=just now}}
cx-save-draft-shortcut-label: Kpɛhimi li ka di do luɣ' shɛli polo.
cx-save-draft-tooltip: Lɛbigir' shɛŋa din na do luɣ' shɛli polo kpɛrila di toli
cx-save-draft-error: Chiriŋ ka di ni kpɛri yaɣili maa puuni.
cx-contributions-translation-tooltip: Lɛbigimi yaɣ' shɛŋa din pun beni
cx-publishing-dialog-title: Sabi pa yaɣ' shɛŋa din beni zuɣu?
cx-publishing-dialog-sub-title: A ni lɛbigi shɛli maa ni du n-nyaŋ yaɣ' shɛli din pun beni maa. pahimi suɣilo, kpaŋmi a maŋa ka saɣi ni di zani lahabali shɛli din beni maa zaani.
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-title: Zaŋ wuhi salo ni yɛlmuɣisiri shɛŋa din beni?
cx-overwriting-with-issues: A ni lɛbigi shɛli maa ni du n-nyaŋ yaɣ' shɛli din pun beni maa. pahimi suɣilo, kpaŋmi a maŋa ka saɣi ni di zani lahabali shɛli din beni maa zaani.
cx-translation-label-published: Lebigibu shɛŋa din pun wuhi salo
cx-stats-published-translations-title: Lɛbigibu shɛŋa din pun wuhi salo
cx-draft-discard-confirmation-message: A dihi tabili ni a shiri bɔrimi ni a yihi a ni lɛbigi shɛli maa bahi zaa sa?
cx-beta-feature-enabled-notification: Lahabali lɛbigibu soli nyɛla din yooi wiki puuni.
